nofishrod.name: No Fish Rod
nofishrod.description:
Gives a **50%** chance to catch an extra fish**.**
Gives 10% chance for **+1 mult.**

shittyrod.name: Shitty Rod
shittyrod.description:
Gives a **65%** chance to catch an extra fish**.**
Gives a 30% chance for **+1 mult.**

verysecretrod.name: ?? Rod
verysecretrod.description:
A very secret rod (hi, it's a hint!) that is a bit **better** than **Shitty Rod** by chance and price**.**
Gives a **70%** chance to catch an extra fish**.**. Gives a 40% chance for **+1 mult.**

scr.name: Shark Caller Rod
scr.description: Gives an **extra 15%** chance to catch a shark (shark base chance is 8%)**.**

normalrod.name: Normal Rod
normalrod.description:
Gives a **95%** chance to catch an extra fish**.**
Gives 75% chance for **+1 mult.**

luckyrod.name: Lucky Rod
luckyrod.description:
Gives an **extra fish.**
Gives 90% chance for **+1 mult.**
Gives **+5%** for a shark**.**

hellowowilikethisid.name: How did you get this Rod?
hellowowilikethisid.description:
Gives **2 extra fish.**
Gives **+1 mult.**
Gives **+3%** for a shark**.**
Reduces the cooldown by **4 seconds.**

steadyrod.name: Steady Rod
steadyrod.description:
Gives an **extra fish.**
Gives a 60% chance for **+2 mult.**
Gives **+2%** for a shark**.**

tridentrod.name: Trident Rod
tridentrod.description:
Gives **2 extra fish.**
Gives a 75% chance for **+2 mult.**
Gives **+2%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 1%.**
Reduces cooldown by **4 seconds.**

heavenlyrod.name: Heavenly Rod
heavenlyrod.description:
Gives **2 extra fish.**
Gives a 85% chance for **+2 mult.**
Gives **+3%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 2%.**
Reduces cooldown by **5 seconds.**

angelicrod.name: Angelic Rod
angelicrod.description:
The OP rod**.**
Gives **3 extra fish.**
Gives an 95% chance for **+2 mult.**
Gives **+10%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 5%.**
Reduces cooldown by **10 seconds.**

nnr.name: No Name Rod
nnr.description:
I don't know what to name it**.**
Gives **3 extra fish.**
Gives a **+2 mult** and a 50% chance for another **+3 mult.**
Gives **+10%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 5%.**
Reduces cooldown by **10 seconds.**

vfr.name: Very Funny Rod
vfr.description:
The fish laugh so they kinda just want to be catched idk**.**
Gives **4 extra fish.**
Gives a **+3 mult** and a 50% chance for another **+3 mult.**
Gives **+10%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 5%.**
Reduces cooldown by **10 seconds.**

wtor.name: Wipe the Ocean Rod
wtor.description:
It just kinda wipes the ocean (and ur balance)**.**
Costs **50k** üêü to buy, but also WIPES ALL UR üêü**.**
Gives **6 extra fish.**
Gives a **+4 mult** and a 75% chance for another **+4 mult.**
Gives **+10%** for a shark and 50% for **additional 5%.**
Reduces cooldown by **10 seconds.**

rfn.name: Random Fishing Net
rfn.description:
Reduces **?fish** cooldown by **5 seconds.**
Has a **30%** chance to make the cooldown even smaller by another **3 seconds** and a **5%** chance to reduce it by extra **2 seconds.**

nfn.name: Normal Fishing Net
nfn.description:
Reduces **?fish** cooldown by **5 seconds.**
Gives a **50%** chance to catch an **extra fish.**

lfn.name: Lucky Fishing Net
lfn.description:
Reduces **?fish** cooldown by **5 seconds.**
Gives an **extra fish.**
Gives a 20% chance for **+1 mult.**
Gives **+1%** for shark chance**.**

sfn.name: Steady Fishing Net
sfn.description:
Reduces **?fish** cooldown by **3 seconds.**
Gives an **extra fish** and a **20% chance** for **another extra fish.**
Gives a 30% chance for **+1 mult.**
Gives **+2%** for shark chance**.**

pfn.name: Pricey Fishing Net
pfn.description:
Reduces **?fish** cooldown by **5 seconds.**
Gives **2 extra fish** and a **40% chance** for **another 2 fish.**
Gives **+2 mult.**
Gives **+10%** for shark chance and a 50% chance for **another 5%.**

floatingcage.name: Floating Cage
floatingcage.description:
A cage that gives a small boost, but it boosts everything.
Gives **+2** fish and **+1 mult**, 30% chance for **-5 seconds** on cooldown and a 40% chance for **+2%** shark chance.

krakenbait.name: Kraken Bait
krakenbait.description:
An infinite amount of bait on ur rod that helps with üêü**.**
Gives **+2 fish** and **+1 mult**, **-4 seconds** on cooldown and a 20% chance for **+2%** shark chance.
